duties_responsibilities.duty: Installation, support, and ongoing technical service for Electronic Gaming Machines (slot machines) and related products.
Troubleshoot, repair, and perform removal of Gaming Machines, Signs, and gaming controllers with little assistance.
Complete all installations and visitation scheduled by the Operations Manager or Supervisor.
Provide customer support for parts purchasing advice through national service.
Aid customers by telephone or in person regarding technical challenges and report on trends, needs, and service challenges through current CRM.
Maintain inventory accuracy and follow parts inventory process for assigned service vehicle.
Maintain confidentiality of information regarding the company, company products, and employee information.
Pre-site surveys, follow schedule, and perform service activities assigned.
Gather and report accurately on service activities by utilizing field service management reporting tools.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or its equivalent required; experience of service/maintenance or equivalent in an industrial environment preferred.
